_sText:
awp_metro By: BaBaBaBaBirdman
This map is set in a small city street. There is a subway/train station area beneath the street. Players spawn on top of buildings, on the streets, and in the subway area. Counter Terrorist spawn on one side of the buildings, and the terrorist on the other, move around to the other side of the street or take the underground subway area to find your opponents. Weapons Players are equipped with:
  • Magnum Sniper Rifle/ Awp
  • Desert Eagle
  • High Explosive Grenade (HEG)
The bots are highly intelligent in this map. They no all the areas and move in them very well. It's fun to play with bots and or people. Took me a while to make this map, and I hope you enjoy!
